-e ---

𓍼 𓎁 𓊄

𓎁 ≠ 𓈝 𓅓 caminar 𓎁 ≈ 𓊄 zieh 𓎁 ≈ 𓍿 𓎀 𓏔 𓏕

𓍿 𓊃 𓋭 | tie on | zieh-fest

𓍿 𓊃 𓂻 | journey | ziehen

𓊄 | (imperative) go ! | Zieh!

𓊄 | who ?, what ? | qui? che? que?

𓍼 𓂻 | set out, depart (to) | ziehen

𓋴 𓍬 𓍿 𓄿 𓂻 | drag | sz𓍬c Zug! ciągnąć ziehen σέρνω sérno zerren 𓋴 𓍬 𓍿 𓄿 𓂻 | drag | чирэх chirekh 引きずる ひきずる hikizuru

𓊃 𓊃 𓈖 𓈀 | cause to pass | ziehen

𓃀 𓊃 𓆛 | enter | beziehen <<< vs kirib

𓂝 𓂋 𓈎 𓍼 𓏛 | don (a garment) |
